title: Ephemera, "Album: A. & M. Karagheusian"
description: A thick black border encloses a pale beige ground in this square-shaped mailing label. Extending downward from the border's outer edge a short distance into the ground are four gilt dagger-like shapes, each terminating in five small dots, gradually decreasing in size. From (in miniature, rust-colored stencil-style capitals, is imprinted immediately below, one letter per "dagger")/ A. & M. Karagheusian (in somewhat larger stencil-style, in black, stretching from border to border)/ 295 fifth Avenue New York (in hand-lettered style, upright rust-colored script, evocative of Art Deco type). Stretching from left to right, three lines of serif-style type in small rust-colored capitals, a mix of upright and italicized, are imprinted within the ground, just above the inner border edge at bottom. Four dagger-like shapes, aligned with the upper design, are imprinted on the lower border.

tombstone.epitaph: Ephemera, "Album: A. & M. Karagheusian". 13 x 13 cm (5 1/16 x 5 1/16 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-84-oo.
